com.androidrecord.db
Class DatabaseManager

java.lang.Object
  android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      com.androidrecord.db.DatabaseManager

public class DatabaseManager
extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper

Once the models are registered from the root activity and bootStrapDatabase is called, it creates a database for the application if one does not already exist.
